channel.title: Mail - Tag - 风吹过的烟花
channel.description: Mail - Tag - 风吹过的烟花

item.title: Spring Boot发送邮件
item.author: Author
item.description: 本文环境 jdk 1.8 maven 3.6.1 Spring Boot 2.1.6 引入依赖 pom.xml 1 2 3 4 <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-mail</artifactId> </dependency> 在application.properties中添加邮件配置(以QQ邮箱为例) 1 2 3 4 5 6 7
